item.description:
Hi Ladies!

I'm Has, I'm a Diamond member, and Ia member of The Leukemia & Lymphoma Society’s Team In Training Program and am participating in the NYC Half-Marathon to raise funds for The Leukemia & Lymphoma Society. Here's some brief info and links:

MY IDEA TO RAISE FUNDS: 

 I'm having a happy hour event on Thursday, February 17th  from 6PM to 9PM at Naked Lunch to raise funds for the marathon.  

Location - Naked Lunch, 17 Thompson St. (and Grand St.) 
Take A, C, E to Canal Street

Time - Thursday, February 17th 6PM to 9PM

Cost - $5 cover (proceeds go to Team In Training)

When people need to RSVP by - February 17th

How many people can RSVP - As many as would like to

Your email address for them to contact you - henshas@hotmail.com 

************************************************

http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=107244156019397

DRINKS WILL INCLUDE: 
$5 cover (proceeds go to Team In Training)

Choose from the following:

Sobieski Vodka Drinks (Martini $2 up charge) $5
Wine of the Day $6
Beer of the Day $5
Bud/Bud Light $4
House Brands $5

$7 Naked Cucumber Mojitos!!

Naked Lunch
17 Thompson St. (and Grand St.)

Take A, C, E to Canal Street

WHAT YOUR DONATION WILL MEAN: 

The Leukemia & Lymphoma Society’s Team In Training Program raises money for leukemia, Hodgkin and non-Hodgkin lymphoma, and myeloma research and patient assistance programs.

Some important things to know about your donation:


75 cents of every dollar raised goes directly to Leukemia Society funds.
Patient Services funds go directly to patient care and counseling, often helping to pay costs not covered by insurance.
Research funding has helped to develop treatments that have increased the survival rate of children suffering with Leukemia from 4% in 1960 to over 85% today.
Your donation is 100% tax deductible. 

http://www.teamintraining.org/
http://www.lls.org/all_chap
http://pages.teamintraining.org/nyc/halfnyc11/hasina
item.how_to_find_us: Just contact Has onhere before hand for instructions!
item.why: Come support one of our Diamond Madam sister's Has as she fundraises for a marathon to fight Leukemia... More details below
item.name: HAPPY HOUR EVENT TO SUPPORT A GOOD CAUSE & OUR DIAMOND MEMBER SISTER '"HAS"
